alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 12:28PM MDT until March 31 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult through mountain passes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow could reduce visibility Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
